front.title: RMFP: A Reliable Multicast Framing Protocol

abstract.t: There has been considerable interest in reliable multicast, and anumber of reliable multicast transport applications and systems havebeen built in the past years, e.g. [PGM], [RMDP], [RMTP], [SRM]. Asurvey of most of current reliable multicast protocols is available in[Diot97].
